snippet: A crime spree left a North Carolina couple dead and their home burned before a man and his son were arrested after a shootout that wounded two police officers in West Virginia.
lead_paragraph: A crime spree left a North Carolina couple dead and their home burned before a man and his son were arrested after a shootout that wounded two police officers in West Virginia.

headline.main: West Virginia: Suspects in 2 Killings Are Apprehended After Shootout
headline.print_headline: West Virginia: Suspects In 2 Killings Are Apprehended After Shootout
